span.span: Audubon Community Schools is CLOSED for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year.
2020 Spring Sports Season is canceled. Summer Sports will be decided by June 1.

li.a: Mr. Sam Graeve, PreK-4 Principal, Curriculum Director
